title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are not displayed in the Available Items sector.
EB:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Expand the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon. 
2. Expected Result: The table icons and column icons should show up. 
3. Actual Result: The column icons do not show up.
SR: Fix the issue so that the column icons are displayed correctly when connecting to a Derby database.
